text: E'i ana zama fore'ma haniana na'ankure, Ninive kumamo'a mago knare agi agonane monko a'mo'ma safeza huno vene'nema zamavare agrarega atreankna huno, maka kumatamimpi vahera zamazeri savari hige'za eme monko avu'ava zana nehazageno, safe'zama nehia zantamina rempi huzamige'za ana avu'ava hu'nazagu anara hugahie.
